jrhc.hairtierdesc: Tier 1 options are for the rotations   and length and Tier 2 options are for bending properties and DBC shape     change Intensity
jrhc.hairdoalldesc: The sliders that turn grey will copy changes to every block on this page
jrhc.hairsalondesc: It will open the HairSalon site where you can browse hairstyles from other users at http://HairSalon.jingames.net
jrhc.hairsharedesc: It will copy your current hairstlye code to clipboard to share with others, mainly meant for the http://HairSalon.jingames.net site
jrhc.hairpastedesc: It will paste a hairstlye code from clipboard
jrhc.hairresetdesc: It will reset the current hairstyle to the hairstlye preset currently selected
